## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generation Setup at Position(x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
-   **Purpose:** To generate electricity using steam power. It remains largely non-functional due to lack of fuel supply to boilers and incomplete steam connections.
-   **Components:**
    -   Offshore Pump at Position(x=-9.5, y=-0.5) (Status: WORKING)
    -   PipeGroup starting at Position(x=-8.5, y=-0.5) supplying water to boilers (Status: FULL_OUTPUT, connects to all three boilers)
    -   Boiler at Position(x=-4.0, y=-0.5) (Status: NO_FUEL)
    -   Boiler at Position(x=-1.0, y=-0.5) (Status: NO_FUEL)
    -   Boiler at Position(x=2.0, y=-0.5) (Status: NO_FUEL)
    -   Burner Inserter at Position(x=-5.5, y=-0.5) (Intended to fuel Boiler at x=-4.0, Status: WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS)
    -   Burner Inserter at Position(x=-2.5, y=-0.5) (Intended to pass steam/fuel?, Status: WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS)
    -   Burner Inserter at Position(x=0.5, y=-0.5) (Intended to fuel Boiler at x=2.0, Status: WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS)
    -   Steam Engine at Position(x=5.5, y=0.5) (Status: NOT_CONNECTED, no fluid)
    -   Steam Engine at Position(x=3.5, y=3.5) (Status: NOT_CONNECTED, no fluid)

### Coal Mining Setup at Position(x=17.0, y=1.0)
-   **Purpose:** To mine coal.
